channel.title: 2019 on Teske's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2019 on Teske's Blog

item.title: Enter 2019 With a Bang
item.description: Transitioning from WordPress to Github Welcome to my first attempt at moving away from WordPress and over to github.io. This will be a trial run. Motivation I wanted to increase my blogs post cadence to more than a few posts a year and leverage MarkDown in the process because that’s what the cool kids are doing. I looked at WP and in order to add the MD plugin, you had to be a Business Plan subscriber at a mere cough cough $25/month.
